availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John P. Thorel (Boyle County, Kentucky, shoe and boot maker)

body.p: Boyle County, Kentucky, shoe and boot maker. Native of France. Married to Elizabeth Figg Thorel in Boyle County on November 2, 1852. Father of Bathilde Thorel. Shoe and boot maker in Boyle County in 1860. Shoe and boot maker in Boyle County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyle County, Danville, p. 917.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Boyle County Marriages, Film #000216817, p. 12.
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 06, Boyle County, Kentucky, 1864 (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "John Peter Thorel (1822-1892)," Memorial #44580060, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/44580060 (accessed September 11, 2020).
